flawed_nl_solution:
Teresa has 94 pencils because 14 + 35 = <<14+35=94>>94
Teresa gives away 84 pencils because 94 - 10 = <<94-10=84>>84
Each sibling gets 28 pencils because 84 / 3 = <<84/3=28>>28
#### 28

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 49, not 94. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
